item.title: Tech Events API
item.description: This open source project is organized by Code for Greenville, a Code for America brigade. I’ve been contributing to the project since 2020, with most of my activity beginning in early 2022. This application queries data.openupstate.org/ to create a list of organizations hosting events on Meetup.com and Eventbrite.com Issues I’ve participated in:

item.title: Chef's Notebook
item.description: Chef’s Notebook is a full-stack application built in Django and React.js.
